greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array A(n,k), n >= 0, k >= 0, read by antidiagonals, where column k is the expansion of g.f. Product_{i>0} Sum_{j=0..k} (-1)^j*j!*x^(j*i).
mathematica: col[k_] := CoefficientList[Product[Sum[(-1)^j j! x^(i j), {j, 0, k}], {i, 1, nmax+1}] + O[x]^(nmax+1), x]; M = PadRight[col[#], nmax+1]& /@ Range[0, nmax] // Transpose;
Table[A[n-k, k], {n, 0, nmax}, {k, n, 0, -1}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Nov 15 2020 *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Oct 03 2017
